item.title: Xprize Carbon awarded to a dirt simple carbon removal technology
item.description: Mati Carbon walked away with the $50 million grand prize for its enhanced rock weathering program that locks carbon in soils for thousands of years.

item.title: Muscle Memory Isn’t What You Think It Is
item.description: In her new book, On Muscle, Bonnie Tsui investigates the other stuff our thews remember—like how to grow when you exercise.
